snippet.title: WarSphere - Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description: The new WarSphere trailer just got ready for the Steam Next Fest, starting 5th of February! Check the game out on Steam! In general have a look at the Steam Next Fest, a lot of great upcoming games are covered there! WarSphere Demo is out now and full release of WarSphere will be 15th of February 2024! The base game will be free, be sure to grab it!
